title: HuggingFace GGUF JSON Variant Scraper
description: Create a robust Node.js script to scrape all JSON variants from HuggingFace GGUF model pages using lol-html for HTML parsing.
acceptance_criteria:
- Script successfully scrapes JSON variant files from HuggingFace GGUF pages
- Uses lol-html for efficient HTML parsing
- Handles various page structures gracefully
- Outputs to files/llama-cpp/ directory
- Includes error handling and logging
- Well-documented and maintainable code

title: Configure scroll speed across all applications
description:
Configure appropriate scroll speed settings across all applications used in the desktop environment:
- niri (compositor)
- kitty (terminal)
- wezterm (terminal)
- ghostty (terminal)
- opencode

Each application may have different mechanisms for adjusting scroll speed. This epic tracks the individual configuration tasks.

title: Configure scroll speed in ghostty
description: Research and configure scroll speed settings in ghostty terminal.

title: Configure mouse scroll speed in kitty
description: Research and configure mouse scroll speed settings in kitty terminal.

title: Configure scroll speed in niri
description: Research and configure scroll speed settings in niri compositor.

title: Configure scroll speed in opencode
description: Research and configure scroll speed settings in opencode.

title: Configure scroll speed in wezterm
description: Research and configure scroll speed settings in wezterm terminal.

title: Emit systemd sysext and confext layers
description:
Add support for generating systemd system extension (sysext) and configuration extension (confext) layers.

These are OS-level extension mechanisms in systemd that allow stacking additional filesystem layers on top of the base system:
- sysext: System extensions for adding binaries, libraries, and other system files
- confext: Configuration extensions for adding drop-in configuration

Both use raw GPT disk images with specific partition types and can be merged at runtime via systemd-sysext/systemd-confext.
